meanings.definition: Preventing or counteracting the spread of a plague.
meanings.sent1: The antiplague measures helped keep the community safe from the disease.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommended using antiplague methods to stop the illness from spreading.
meanings.sent3: The antiplague efforts were so effective that the town remained healthy and happy.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to be antiplague in her actions inspired others to take precautions.
meanings.sent5: The bright red sign with the antiplague symbol reminded everyone to stay vigilant against the sickness.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment used to combat a plague.
meanings.sent1: The medical team quickly distributed the antiplague to those in need.
meanings.sent2: The government stockpiled antiplague supplies in case of an outbreak.
meanings.sent3: The ancient recipe for the antiplague potion was discovered in an old book.
meanings.sent4: The antiplague injection acted as a shield against the deadly virus.
meanings.sent5: People lined up to receive the life-saving antiplague medication during the crisis.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that works against the spread of a plague.
meanings.sent1: The doctor was hailed as an antiplague hero for his tireless efforts.
meanings.sent2: The cat, known for catching rats, was considered the household's antiplague.
meanings.sent3: The little girl proudly declared herself the family's official antiplague warrior.
meanings.sent4: The antiplague mascot of the town was a brave squirrel with a tiny shield.
meanings.sent5: The ancient talisman was believed to be an antiplague charm that protected its wearer from harm.
